entry.title: Devops for Bitcoin
entry.summary:
I've worked the last 10 years for a large scale software-vendor on devOps and SRE topuics. Now i want to bring that knowledge to the bitcoin ecosystem!

Do you need Continuous-Delivery, devOps or SRE? Do you struggle to get your product out of the door, have software-quality-issues or need help â€¦
entry.content:
I've worked the last 10 years for a large scale software-vendor on devOps and SRE topuics. Now i want to bring that knowledge to the bitcoin ecosystem!

Do you need Continuous-Delivery, devOps or SRE? Do you struggle to get your product out of the door, have software-quality-issues or need help with Raising uptime, scaling out or build up your 24/7 support?

Contact me!
